content.description: This a slab route with bulges at the start and the top.  At the top, stay on the face, but the arete is on.
content.protection: Gear.  Tree or boulder to bring up second or hang a top rope.
content.location: Starts on the right side of the formation and stay to the right side.

content.description:
There are a few variations...

 Direct start up the original boulder problem "The Immelman", straight up the slab to the headwall, and top out 5.10+. Gear is good when you have it. 

 Starting on right side of formation on White Knight Traddie Brigade 5.5 and moving into middle of slab, up headwall 5.9+.

 "R" rating is due to the fall zone from headwall.
content.protection: Gear.  Great tree at top to belay your second or hang a Top Rope.
content.location: This is the largest formation reached after passing the Basilisk Wall.

content.description:
Top-Rope + Boulder area on right (E) side of the Revoluionary Ramparts West area. 

  problems + routes in this sector include (L to R) . . . 

 the Immelman. . . (and variations)
